column3: @hebasto This is missing the `Github-Pull:` and `Rebased-From:` info for each commit. See the [backport.py](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-maintainer-tools/blob/master/backport.py) script.
@fanquake \n\n~~Is there a way to fix "The job exceeded the maximum time limit for jobs, and has been terminated." error in [Travis job](https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/497191864)?~~
Is is necessary to be backported? It seems like a breaking change.
I don't think this is a breaking change. Otherwise this was missed in the original review
Thanks, however I don't think this needs backporting into 0.17.2.
